text: You can do it with the code editor and add a custom class and span there ( But its not an ideal way)
I wonder if there is explanation of appearing of “apply changes” button on some modules I’ve created when editing a page.  Only on some.

The “Apply Changes” button appears when there’s scripts present in the module’s `module.js` file. It’s to prevent a module’s scripts from firing over and over again while the content is being updated.
that was my first idea so I deleted a script but havn’t noticed any change in module behavior
I wonder If I did smth wrong
If you are using HubSpot CTAs in a module, I believe HubSpot still requires a script behind the scenes to render them on page load
Oh, great catch <@U03KAK3R4GY> — that’s a condition I wasn’t aware of!
